t: I Love Chamoy wholesale products
s: I was born and raised in Mexico so chamoy was a staple of my childhood and in my house growing up. I loved how it made everything taste sweeter and a little spicy at the same time. About a decade ago my dad was diagnosed with diabetes and could no longer enjoy this delicious Mexican sauce.
